cmp: 了 ((modal particle intensifying preceding clause)/(completed action marker), to know/to understand/to know, clear, look afar from a high place)
mng: cooking method, to boil sb alive (capital punishment in imperial China)

exm.mng: ruling a large nation is like cooking a small delicacy (idiom), effective government requires minimal intervention
exm.pyn: zhì dà guó ruò pēng xiǎo xiān

exm.mng: lit. to boil the hound once it caught the rabbit (idiom), fig. to get rid of sb once he has served his purpose
see 兔死狗烹[tu4 si3 gou3 peng1]
exm.pyn: jiǎo tù sǐ zǒu gǒu pēng
